Description:
Required Skills to be successfulAdvanced Excel skills to include complex formulas, tables, charts, lookups, macros (VBA) and data modelling
Ability to synthesize information and data from a variety of sources
Excellent analytical and problem resolution skills
Ability to work under pressure and adapt to changing priorities
Excellent consultation and interpersonal skills with a high level of tact, diplomacy and confidentiality
Excellent client service skills
Extremely detail oriented What equips you for the role5+ years progressive professional experience, ideally in Rewards or HR

Knowledge of labour laws and regulations Job Details
